title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

reviews.comment: Mind-blowing concept and execution!
Great visuals and storytelling.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

reviews.comment: One of the greatest films ever made.
Powerful storytelling and performances.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

reviews.comment: Heath Ledger's Joker is legendary!
Redefines the superhero genre.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

reviews.comment: Brilliant dialogue and structure!
Iconic scenes and characters.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

reviews.comment: Revolutionary visual effects and concept!
Changed action movies forever.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

reviews.comment: Tom Hanks at his absolute best!
Beautiful journey through American history.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

reviews.comment: The definitive gangster film.
Masterpiece of cinema.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

reviews.comment: Visually stunning and emotionally powerful!
Great blend of science and emotion.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

reviews.comment: Perfect adaptation of Tolkien's masterpiece!
Epic start to an amazing trilogy.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

reviews.comment: Mind-bending twist and social commentary!
Brilliant direction and performances.

title: Goodfellas
description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

reviews.comment: The definitive mob movie of our time!
Scorsese at his absolute best.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

reviews.comment: Hopkins' performance is chilling and unforgettable!
Perfect blend of psychological horror and crime thriller.

title: Schindler's List
description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

reviews.comment: Essential viewing for understanding the Holocaust.
Spielberg's masterpiece - powerful and devastating.

title: The Departed
description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

reviews.comment: Brilliant performances and tense storytelling!
Great depiction of Boston's criminal underworld.

title: Gladiator
description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

reviews.comment: Epic storytelling and memorable performances!
Perfect blend of action and drama.

title: The Green Mile
description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

reviews.comment: One of the most moving films ever made!
Beautiful adaptation of Stephen King's novel.

title: Saving Private Ryan
description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

reviews.comment: Most realistic war scenes ever filmed!
Powerful portrayal of the human cost of war.

title: The Prestige
description: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

reviews.comment: Brilliant twists and turns throughout!
One of Nolan's most underrated masterpieces.

title: The Lion King
description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

reviews.comment: Disney's greatest animated film!
Perfect for all ages with timeless themes.

title: Jurassic Park
description: A pragmatic paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

reviews.comment: Revolutionary special effects that still hold up!
Defined a generation of adventure films.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

reviews.comment: The perfect superhero team-up movie!
Brought the MCU together brilliantly.

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

reviews.comment: A timeless love story with spectacular visuals!
Great blend of historical event and fictional narrative.

title: The Social Network
description: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

reviews.comment: Brilliant portrayal of the birth of social media!
Fincher and Sorkin create magic together.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

reviews.comment: Revolutionary visual effects and world-building!
Immersive alien world with environmental message.

title: The Truman Show
description: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

reviews.comment: Carrey's best dramatic performance!
Profound exploration of reality and media.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.

reviews.comment: Perfect Wes Anderson style and storytelling!
A visual feast with incredible attention to detail.

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
description: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

reviews.comment: The most unique love story ever filmed!
Brilliant concept with emotional depth.

title: Whiplash
description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

reviews.comment: Simmons delivers one of the greatest performances ever!
Intense, gripping, and perfectly paced.

title: The Shining
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

reviews.comment: The definition of psychological horror!
Masterful direction and unforgettable imagery.

title: Parasite
description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

reviews.comment: A perfect blend of genres with social commentary!
Deserving of all its accolades and more.

title: Spirited Away
description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

reviews.comment: Miyazaki's greatest masterpiece!
Magical storytelling for all ages.

title: The Revenant
description: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

reviews.comment: DiCaprio's Oscar-winning performance is incredible!
Some of the most stunning visuals ever filmed.

title: Inglourious Basterds
description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

reviews.comment: Tarantino's alternate history masterpiece!
Brilliant tension and unforgettable characters.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

reviews.comment: Excessive, outrageous, and absolutely brilliant!
DiCaprio and Scorsese at their most unhinged.

title: Blade Runner 2049
description: Young Blade Runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

reviews.comment: A worthy sequel that expands on the original!
Roger Deakins' Oscar-winning visuals are breathtaking.

title: La La Land
description: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

reviews.comment: A beautiful modern musical with heart!
Great performances and memorable songs.

title: The Sixth Sense
description: A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

reviews.comment: The twist that defined a generation of thrillers!
Perfectly crafted supernatural thriller.

title: The Martian
description: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

reviews.comment: The most scientifically accurate space film!
Damon's performance carries this survival story.

title: Memento
description: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

reviews.comment: Nolan's breakthrough film is still his most innovative!
Brilliant narrative structure and concept.

title: Casablanca
description: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

reviews.comment: The definition of a perfect classic film!
Timeless romance with unforgettable dialogue.

title: Joker
description: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.

reviews.comment: Phoenix delivers a haunting, Oscar-worthy performance!
Dark, disturbing, and thought-provoking.

title: The Pianist
description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

reviews.comment: Brody's performance is devastating and powerful!
A haunting portrayal of survival through art.

title: Braveheart
description: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

reviews.comment: Epic historical drama with unforgettable battle scenes!
Gibson's direction and performance are outstanding.

title: The Princess Bride
description: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

reviews.comment: The perfect blend of comedy, romance, and adventure!
Endlessly quotable and charming for all ages.

title: Good Will Hunting
description: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

reviews.comment: Williams and Damon create magic together!
A touching story about potential and healing.

title: The Usual Suspects
description: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

reviews.comment: One of the greatest twist endings in cinema!
Brilliant storytelling that rewards multiple viewings.

title: Alien
description: After a space merchant vessel receives an unknown transmission as a distress call, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious life form and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

reviews.comment: The perfect blend of sci-fi and horror!
Atmospheric, tense, and still terrifying today.

title: Amélie
description: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.

reviews.comment: A whimsical, colorful, and heartwarming masterpiece!
Tautou's performance is utterly charming.

title: The Big Lebowski
description: Jeff 'The Dude' Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

reviews.comment: The Coen brothers' funniest and most quotable film!
Bridges IS The Dude, and The Dude abides.

title: Oldboy
description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

reviews.comment: A masterpiece of revenge cinema with an unforgettable twist!
The corridor fight scene alone is worth the watch.
